updates.update_userinfo: A little sidenote about our friends at BackerClub
updates.update_content:
Jogger Denim team! 
In the past week, we've nearly met our goal! If we do, we'll be producing Jogger Denim in Canada for the very first time. And it's all thanks to you. 
3 things...
1. STRETCH GOALS! 
You can shape the design and function of Jogger Denim. Here are some ideas (I'll try to give credit where it's due, but forgive me if I forget something):
> black denim (via Dan Helper)
> belt loops (via soxcited) 
[NOTE: we're still coming up with ideas, so feel free to suggest anything. Anything at all!]


There are still who can get this delivered by the holidays. Can you imagine them opening up a box with a perfectly sized pair of cuffed denim Jogger Pants? Share the campaign link to let your friends in on those Early Birds! () 

You guys are the best. I want to personally thank these backers... shori, soxcited, Ian Borgman, Tina Park, Kon Cheung, Calvin Ly, Kristine Buerano, David Mounma, Robert An, Romeo, Dan Helper, Russell Kwan, Michael Prosserman, Mark Cor, Boisterouschow, Michael O'Donoghue, Ralph Kreisl, 진동, Will Gong, Eileen Matheson, and Kristian Paris! It's been great getting to know you guys in the inbox. I appreciate all the dreams, ambitions, and enthusiasm that you're bringing to this campaign every single day. In the words of Michael Buble, "I'll give so much more than I get."

Hi! I wanted to take a moment to thank you. 

Because of your phenomenal support, Jogger Denim is now 50% funded! We can't wait to share the ultimate jogger pant with you. In the meantime, we're here and we're listening. Suggestions, feedback, questions... come to us with anything!
And 2 last things...

campaign.story:
Everyday Carry, Carryology, UpVisually, TechMASH, Daily Crowdfunder and Red Echoes
The Traditional bi-fold wallet carries more than you will ever need, it's too big for comfort, and causes back problems.  BASICS wallet = Solution
A rubber band wallet is too simple, not easily accessible, and is not something you want to show off to your friends. BASICS Wallet = Solution
We wanted to create a wallet that solved the problems associated with traditional wallets, and offered these convenient features:
Slim
Durable
Functional / Easy access to ALL cards
Ability to hold as many or as few cards as wanted.
Looks classy
It was a long process creating a wallet that solved all of these issues, and offered enhanced features.  We spent the last eight months testing multiple designs, methods, and materials to meet the above criteria. Through many long hours spent in the basement on the sewing machine, we finally got to the perfect wallet. Here are some of the prototypes that got us to our final destination.
PLAY

PLAY

Thank you in advance for your generous support.  We are so excited about this wallet. With your support, we hope to get this wallet in as many pockets as possible. Thanks again and again, it means the world to us!
We have set the delivery date as January.  Our original goal was December, however having worked in product development for 5 years, we understand the reality of the process and that obstacles will likely arise that will slow us down.  So rather than over-promise and under-deliver, we hope to be transparent and help set the right expectations.  So plan to receive the wallet in January, however we plan to work ourselves ragged to deliver in time for the holidays.  Either way, this wallet is worth the wait, trust us!
We promise to keep our backers in the loop all along the way. We know that we can't do this without you.  If you ever have any questions, feel free to reach out to us and we will get back to you ASAP.
Thanks for taking the time to check out our project.  We are so excited to bring the BASICS wallet to market! Please back us, or help us spread the word, so that we can put the BASICS Wallet in as many pockets as possible, starting with you guys.
https://www.facebook.com/basicsproducts
http://www.instagram.com/basicsproducts
http://www.twitter.com/basicsproducts
http://www.pinterest.com/basicsproducts
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
We have spent lots of time in developing this product, finding competent people who can manufacture it and have planned out what types of resources and man hours we are going to need to fulfill all the pledges we receive. We are confident in our team's competence and abilities to do this right, however as with any project there are always bumps and unforeseen obstacles that could arise along the way. Our plan to deal with any potential obstacles is to be completely transparent to our backers, after all, without you guys we would be nothing. We will work through the night to get your rewards to you, and we will keep you informed all along the way. Thank you so much for your support!
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

campaign.story:
THE PROBLEM 
When you’re always on the go and usually charge your phone or tablet with a laptop or PC in the office or an USB port in the car, have you noticed that charging this way takes a really long time? And it’s almost impossible to actually increase your phone’s battery power if you’re using it as a GPS even while your phone is plugged in into your car's USB port; that's because your phone is using more power than the power your USB port can supply to your phone.   
WHY DOES A PC/USB PORT CHARGE SO SLOW?
A regular USB cable is made to communicate (transfer data) and to act as a power supply between your USB port and your device.
When you connect your device (i.e. phone, table, etc.) to your USB port(on your laptop or in your car), USB port automatically prepares to communicate with your device and provide limited electric energy:  to sync AND charge.  Simply put, attempting to transfer data and charge at the same time is the main reason why charging is so slow.
THE SOLUTION 
Turning the switch ON to DouBBleTime mode results in faster charging time for your device when plugged into your computer or USB port in your car.
 DouBBleTime with Samsung Galaxy
DouBBleTime with iPhone
Fast Charging AND Secure
An added bonus of DouBBleTime Charging Cable-it protects your personal and private data stored on your devices by blocking data connection. When DouBBleTime mode is turned ON, the cable prevents accidental data exchange when your device is plugged into a foreign charge source. DouBBLeTime mode achieves this by blocking off the data communication between your phone and USB ports, allowing only power charging to take place (at DouBBle the charging pace compared to a regular usb cable).
HOW IT WORKS
A simple yet ingenious special chip inside the switch talks to your computer saying, ‘I’m not a phone; I’m not going to sync, so give me maximum charging energy.’ This message allows the cable to bypass the capped out maximum power a USB can output and connect straight to the mainboard. The special chip also provides over current protection (OCP) and short circuit protection, which guarantees the safety of both your computer and device while charging. 
TESTING DouBBleTime CHARGING CABLE
TEST PROTOCOL:
We used several power sources in our tests; used the USB charging cable from the original phone packaging for each phone or tablet and the USB ports of several different laptops (both PC and Mac). In addition, various vehicles with USB port were used for car charging tests.
TEST RESULTS:
COMPATIBILITY  
PROGRESS 
 TIMELINE
In order to bring more than just a concept and idea to Kickstarter campaign, we have completed the following milestones:
Design Complete
PCB Tooling Complete
Environmental and Field testing Complete
Supply agreement Complete with MFI licensed USB cable manufacturer
We need your help to complete the following:
Plastic mechanical tooling for the switch.  We need funding to pay for tooling (mold)
Packaging design
Website design
Working capital to pay for raw materials
 Why Kickstarter?
When we first shared the DouBBleTime Charging Cable idea to friends and co-workers in Silicon Valley, everyone said “You should check out Kickstarter!” And we asked, “What is that? How can Kickstarter help us complete this project?”
After researching Kickstarter, we fell in love with the idea of crowd-funding and even contributed to a couple of cool campaigns. We also reached out to other project creators whose campaigns were successfully funded and loved the sense of community and help we received along the way!
This is our first campaign and we’re super excited to have our ideas become a reality through the Kickstarter community. 
DouBBleTime Team
Minsoo Seo - Founder with extensive Project Management experience
Emily Seo - Founder, Marketing and Advertising experience
Richard Cho - Mechanical Engineer with 18 years of product development experience
Young Ran Jung - Electrical Engineer with 14 years of computer architecture and USB experience
Dong Hun Lee - Electrical Engineer with 15 years of power design work
Dan Xiong - Industrial Designer with 8 years of smart device accessories design experience 
Feng Haoyu - Multidisciplinary Creator. Bringing influence from art, design and photography together
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
DouBBLeTime Charging Cable 7 months in the making and it has been a rewarding experience to take it from concept to working samples. These working samples have been tested extensively to prove charging times and safety. We have already set up agreements with key suppliers (certified MFi connector factory) and contracted manufacturer. And we have expertly-designed printed circuit boards in hand. These are just a few steps we’ve taken to make sure the product is delivered correctly and on time!

Our biggest concern and challenge will come from manufacturing of our product. From the quality of the mold we will be making to final assembly, we have a very high standard and expectation. Meticulously overseeing the manufacturing to ensure we produce tight fitting and well functioning product will be our biggest challenge that lies ahead of us.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

After using this cable with your iPhone, the battery won't last as much as it did before, your phone will turn off at 34% battery and will overall make your phone useless at around 12 AM with normal use. Very disappointed with this product. 0/10

Received my warranty replacement iPhone cable yesterday and have been using it since then. I can report a few things, one the cable has a MUCH sturdier feel than the first cable; the cable itself is noticeably thicker, the bodies of the connectors (USB and lightning) are metal; the "shoulder" at the connection point where the cable meets the connectors is reinforced. All of these makes this cable more sturdy feeling with the hopes of a longer lasting design. I have not tested the electricity flow but the switch clearly blocks communication with the connected computer which was important to me when I charge the phone on my work computer. Not a complaint from me but the cord is much "stiffer" than the old one making storage or potentially tight space transport (pocket, small purse) potentially an issue. The blue light indicating the double charge is brighter, not an issue either way for me but some like a brighter light and some don't. I am very hopeful that this will last longer than the first one and if so I will be buying more.

campaign.story:
Missed the Kickstarter but want the ZipSeam? Pre-order at ZipSeam.com - use code Kickstarter for $5 off!
A poorly fitted shirt or dress makes you look sloppy, lethargic, and unprofessional. The ZipSeam is a patent pending breakthrough invention that allows the user to quickly and inexpensively tailor their own shirts in the comfort of their own homes; turning any off-the-rack item into a sexy, sleek, fashion piece. 
In an attempt to purchase collared shirts for my workplace, the only options offered were shirts of different neck sizes. The resulting shirt fit well around my neck, but my torso looked like I was wearing a one-man tent. Actually tucking in the shirt turned me into a hot air balloon, but leaving it un-tucked gave me an irresistible urge to do twirls in my button-up dress. I’d always noticed a similar ballooning effect on my other collared shirts, albeit to a lesser extent.
I wanted my shirts to fit something like this:
"Slim fit"
All of the department stores have mannequins outfitted in sleek dress shirts, but what matters is this, which isn't immediately apparent…
False advertising anyone?
A quick glance at the back of the mannequins revealed many folds of cloth, hidden from the shopper, beguiling them as to the true fit of the “off the rack” shirts.
Bait and switch haha!
…and so I explored options for bettering the fit of my shirts.
Traditional tailoring is often expensive/cost ineffective, time consuming, and commonly permanent. If you were to take needle and thread to cloth, tailoring one shirt would take the average person well upwards of an hour to possibly result in a questionable result. A whole wardrobe? The thought of tailoring my entire closet is horrifyingly daunting. 
A sewing machine is faster than sewing manually, decreasing the time commitment necessary, but the initial cost at minimum is $50 for a passable machine, not to mention the steep learning curve.
Visiting a professional tailor entails the drive there, the drive home, and then another drive there and back to pick up the finished product. Hopefully the result is satisfactory; otherwise you’ll unfortunately have to plan for another trip for whenever the touch-ups are done. And at the end of the whole ordeal, expect to pony up $15-25, per shirt! 
Having a shirt custom made will cost you even more, running anywhere from $50 to upwards of $100 per shirt. Those costs didn’t fare well with my budget bruised with student loans, so I had to try something new.
The ZipSeam combines material and structural design to create the strongest seam without compromising flexibility and comfort. The patent pending design allows the ZipSeam to be lightweight, removable, AND reusable; users can tailor a shirt in minutes (demonstrated very clearly in the video). The ZipSeam turns clearance rack items into sleek shirts with excellent custom fits.
Comfort- Who would want to wear a piece of plastic inside their shirts? All my friends asked me that, until they tried the shirt with the ZipSeam in it. Thanks to the ridges, the ZipSeam is as flexible as your cell phone charging cord and can easily bend and flex with your body. Though it is a different feel from fabric, it is very much comfortable (I myself wore a shirt with the ZipSeam for 3 straight days). 
Before and After
Before and After
Sam, who is 6'7"
            Ignore my enormous head and you can see the difference
Before and After
I can smile!
ZipSeam bends with your body
Closeup of the seam
CAD design of a prototype
Old prototypes
Prototype
3D printed model did not turn out too well
Different materials tested. Top to bottom: HDPE LLDPE PP
Current Design
Prototype of current design
As you can see, the prototypes all have unsightly burrs; but final products will be injection molded, which would eliminate the burrs whilst keeping the required dimensions and structural integrity consistent (most certainly better than my own unsteady hands with a knife).
To mass produce the ZipSeam, we would need to purchase tooling for production. The tooling will be quite costly, so I am looking for help from Kickstarter.
The ZipSeam will be manufactured in the USA.
April - 
Kickstarter is launched and funds raised
June - 
Manufacturing of the ZipSeam after tooling and die are made
Tooling: 2-3 Weeks
Production Lead Time: 2-3 Weeks
July to August - 
Shipment of orders
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
We have a manufacturer lined up and ready for the volume. I believe the biggest challenge for this project will be shipping; there will be two manufacturers to complete the ZipSeam, and getting the product to you in a timely fashion will be of the utmost importance. Being my first project, I plan on playing the overprotective mom and keeping close contact with both manufacturers on the timeline and production.

Another challenge will be shipping all the products in a timely manner; for this I will be enlisting the help of my friends and family to get your Zipseam shipped on schedule. If orders truly become overwhelming, I will use a local fulfillment company.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_content:
Hello ZipSeam Backers!

A quick update on the project. ZipSeam 2.0 Production has just begun and here is a quick video of most of the process.

Hello! 

I know it's been a while but what a journey it has been. Thank you all once again for supporting my first project. 
After 2 years, I am happy and anxious to launch a redesigned ZipSeam that is lower profile, lighter, more flexible, and much more comfortable.

Hi everyone,
Shipping has resumed and I'm picking up 2000 pieces every couple days. Things are looking good for everything to be shipped by mid-Sept. 
A couple of you requested a zoomed in version of the tutorial so here it is below.

Hello folks, 
The journey thus far has been sunshine and flowers and chocolate bars raining from the sky; unfortunately we have come upon somewhat of a roadblock. 
USPS has been returning a bunch of packages due to "Unable to Forward" or "Not Deliverable", I have been reaching out via Kickstarter and email to get an updated address or alternate address. Should be no big deal. Keep an eye on your inbox.

Happy Monday or Tuesday wherever you may be.
Since the last update I have been packing and shipping the ZipSeams as they are made here in the Chicagoland area. 
I am currently finishing up wave 3 of the ZipSeam, so hold on tight, you will be getting your set very soon. 
At the request of my $50 level backer, I found the ugliest, baggiest shirt (all for the low low price of $3) and made a tutorial out of it. It is uncut and unedited to rule out any movie magic.
Watch it below-

Hey guys,
Here's a quick update on the state of the ZipSeam.
I've been picking up and shipping out the ZipSeams as they are made and just packed up 6 boxes worth.

Okay sorry guys, I have a send out another update. 
Marcus correctly pointed out I would have no idea who you are based off just a phone number and an email address.
If you could, please send your complete shipping address with your phone number to shipping@zipseam.com possibly include your Kickstarter name as well to avoid confusion.
I am really sorry for the trouble I have created.

Sorry about the update spam. 
If you are an international backer please email your phone number to shipping@zipseam.com (no I won't be calling you or sell your number to Google)
Unfortunately a phone number is require for customs. 
If you miss the 2 day edit, I will reach out to you on Kickstarter.
I apologize for the inconvenience.

campaign.story:
The Problem  
Sole- socks is a simple solution to a common annoyance / problem. In today's ever evolving fashion and style trends, more and more people are going sock less. It's become a very popular look / style for both men and woman. You also have a huge amount of people who just don't want to wear socks, whether it be for convenient or laziness, they don't want to wear socks.  There are a couple big issues and annoyances that everyone who is trying to pull off the sock less look has to deal with. If you choose to wear socks, you have to find super small thin socks that don't go above the shoe line. These socks are typically tight, uncomfortable and slip off the heel throughout the day. The other option is to fold down larger socks and deal with bunching and unevenness on your foot. The last option is just to choose not to wear socks. This seems like the most logical right? But then you run into the issue of having sweaty, smelly feet which almost always gets trapped in your shoes and no matter how many times you try to air them out, or even wash them, the smell won't go away. I can't tell you how many pairs of shoes I have had to throw away from rancid, funky smells from not wearing socks. 
THE SOLUTION 
Sole-Socks are specialty insoles that have been created to replace socks. You can machine wash them when they smell and get dirty. Sole socks solve the many problems that we face when trying to pull off the no sock look. This is a deodorization, hygroscopicity and breathable, shock- absorption insole that offers added comfort to your shoe. These also offer air circulation inside the shoe. The end result is that your feet are cool, dry and comfortable.
ABOUT THE DESIGN
Sole- Sock are specially designed with a plush terry cloth top, which absorbs the moisture, odor, and all the other funky things that come from your feet throughout the day. This 100% cotton Terry cloth has been specially designed to be thick with long loops in order to be breathable enough to let heat and air through to the foot but its fibers are designed in a way to absorb anything that shouldn't be in your shoe, such as sweat and odor. The terry cloth is attached with a durable cotton outer layer of fabric and attached with a Bosnian embroidered stitch around the entire outer edge of the sole. The  zig zag looking stitch insures durability and quality during the length of the product life. Sole-Socks were designed to take the wear and tear that occurs each day on your feet. The final component of the design is the base, this is designed in such a way to allow the sole to grip the inside of your shoe and prevent slipping. These same fiber that grip and stabilize the Sole-Sock, are designed in such a way to allows air to flow from underneath your foot. This allows your foot to breath, cools it down and cuts down on sweat and odor.  Additionally, the base layer is perforated to allow the foot to breathe from the bottom. This bottom layer also acts as a padding and support. 
Sole-Socks are designed in a way to offer a little more cushion and comfort on the bottom of your foot. At the same time we designed it in a way to make sure it wasn't to bulky to cause the shoe too become tight and uncomfortable. These were designed to be treated like a pair of socks. 
the design and why it works so well
What about the sweat from the top of my feet?  More than 90% of odor causing perspiration is released at the sole of the feet. 
Materials: 70%cotton, 5% Polyester 25% silicone
bottom of the sole-sock: Groove to help air flow and grip, air hole for breathablity.
base of the sole sock
A detailed photo of the top absorbent material and why it works so well.
PLAY

just for kids
Benefits of sole socks:
Our goal is to keep your feet, COOL, DRY, ODOR FREE AND COMFORTABLE. We know Sole-Socks offer all of these things.
   - Socks don't show anymore
- Extra padding for soles of your shoes 
- Blocks odor
- Breathable 
- Absorbs moister 
- Prevents athletes feet symptoms 
- Comfortable
- Very convenient  
- Machine washable
- Customization to your size and fit
-  Able to use in almost any type shoe
- Take up less space in suitcases / dresser drawer space
- No more socks with holes 
HOW SOLE-SOCKS WORK
Step One: Find out what shoe size you wear. The easiest way to do this would be going to your closet and looking at your shoes. Once you know this, order that size of Sole-sock
Step Two: Once you receive your sole-sock in the mail simply place the left and right foot beds into your chosen pair of shoes. (Should I remove the existing sole? it all depends on your preference. Most people lay the Sole-sock on top of the existing sole due to the fact these are designed as sock and not sole replacements.)
Step Three: Put on your shoes and go about your day.
Step Four: At the end of the day simply remove your custom pair of Sole-Socks and throw them in the washing machine
It's as simple as these 4 steps, treat them like you would a normal pair of socks.
Sole- Socks time lines and future plans.
As you can see sole socks are fully developed, tested and ready for mass production. When our project is funded, all backers will receive there order in less than 60 days. As soon as the project is backed our first full production run will be placed. Production time is about 30 days. Once product is made, we will then sort, package and proceed to ship each individual order to each kickstarter backer. 
Once we have shipped and fulfilled all the backers orders, our plan is to start selling Sole-Socks directly on our website for $10 a pair. We want to reward early backers who support us here on kickstarter with a low price for all the support and belief in our product. Act fast and check out the rewards on the side. We will also target key retailers who we think that would be a good fit / partner. 
We also plan on upgrading our packaging in order to educate the consumer more easily on the benefits of Sole-Socks
PLEASE SHARE THE PROJECT ON FACEBOOK AND INSTAGRAM , YOUR SUPPORT MEANS A LOT.
EXTRA INFO
SIZING: You may be asking how do I know what size Sole-Socks works best for me? We work on a US shoe size system, in both Men's and Woman's. We recommend you purchase the size of sole-sock that you would for shoes size. Sole-Socks are offered in whole sizes only, if you are a half size no worries we got you covered. Sole-Socks are designed to fit full and half size shoe sizes. As a rule of thumb, for those individuals who wear a half size we recommend going down to the nearest whole size. For example if you are a size 9.5 you would order a size 9 Sole-Sock. See chart below for to reference what size will work best for you.
Kids sizes: If we hit our stretch goal of 15,000 we will offer kid sizes sole-socks. We will offer size 8-13 small children and sizes 1-5 big kid sizes as well.
  If your more familiar with other sizing metric feel free to refer to the shoe chart below.
Adult sizing chart for reference
Kids sizing chart: toddlers, little and big kids
Do they really work? I'm sure some people doubt that these could replace their socks and have so many added benefits. To be honest we were a bit skeptical at first as well. Yes, it is a simple design but the product testing and design behind Sole-socks speaks for its self. When analyzing the materials and the functions each one of these materials play into the product, we know our product works and our proud to stand behind it. The only way to truly know for yourself, is to try it out. 
How often do I need to wash my soles-socks? This really depends on you. Each person who uses the product differs widely. Some people's feet sweat a lot more than others. Some people are washing there pair each day, and others are washing there pair of Sole-socks every few weeks. 
Care instructions: How do I wash my sole-socks? It's really simple Sole-Socks are washing machine friendly, just throw them in the washer and let me air dry. They are designed to air dry very quickly and be ready to use with little wait time.
 Why do my feet stink without socks? - Stinky feet are caused by overgrowth of bacteria. Interestingly, a skilled diagnostician can identify the type of bacteria from the smell. Sole-Socks help prevent this bacteria from taking place in your shoes it acts like buffer and stops smell at its source.
ABOUT US
My brother and I have been in Business together since we could remember. I guess you could even go back to our first neighborhood lemonade stand, to most recently working the past 3 years together with a startup based in Boise Idaho. Each of our skill-sets and knowledge has really helped to complement one another in work and family relationships. We get a lot of inspiration from each other and our surroundings. We are extremely passionate about Sole-Socks, the fact that this product solves a problem us and our friends have dealt with makes this project so much more special. We really think that this product is going to change the sock industry. With Tanners expertise in manufacturing and product development and Taylor's experience in marketing and advertising we know that we can bring this product to market.
Tanner and Taylor doing some product testing
Brainstorming & design ideas
For more information check out our Website http://sole-socks.com
Like us on facebook and share our product with your friends.
another detailed photo of the terry cloth top material
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
After months of fine tuning, we have our final product done and ready to go. All product testing is done and the product is proven. Our biggest issue moving forward is going to be estimating inventory amounts in each size of soles for men and woman. Forecasting amounts for production will be somewhat of a challenge due to the fact there is no historical data on a product like ours. But we know with a $4,500 investment this will cover all of our backers and enough to take to market in a select few stores we choose to partner with.

Additionally, we face the challenge of proving to consumers that this product actually works. It's so simple and logical there could be people who doubt the soles actually work as good as a pair of socks at stopping sweat and odor.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

campaign.story:
Thank you and Congratulations to all our amazing supporters who have helped make Orbitkey a reality and also a huge success!  
If you have missed Orbitkey campaign, please visit us on our website Orbitkey.com where you will be updated with latest news and products. If you would like to know when the Orbitkey will be available for order, you can do so by subscribing to the newsletter on our website. 
We hope that we can continue the great interaction and conversation we have been having at Orbitkey social media pages below :) 
Facebook           Twitter              Instagram
Looking for a great Christmas gift for a loved one? Pledge for an Orbitkey and give out an Orbitkey Christmas card to tell that special someone what nice gift they will be receiving in March 2014.
You can download the instruction and print your own Orbitkey Christmas card from this link >> here. The card will have a web link which they can visit and choose their preferred band style from (webpage will be launched before Christmas)! 
Stylish. Make an impression with the Orbitkey. Not only is it practical, Orbitkey embodies elegance. Our objective is to create key accessories that you can be proud to carry.
Organised. Orbitkey transforms your cluster of keys to a neatly organized stack. You can arrange keys in your order of preference, which will help you locate the right key quickly and effortlessly.
Quiet. Orbitkey is truly silent. It just won’t rattle! Perfect for keeping in your pocket when jogging and perfect for sneaking up on people!
No more key scratches. Keys don’t always get along with your smartphones and other precious items; Orbitkey protects your belongings from key scratches.
Personalised. With an interchange-able band design and wide selection of materials and colors to choose from. You can have several bands to suit your style and occasion.
Flexible. Orbitkey caters for both minimalist and traditionalists. Whether you have 3 keys or 9 keys, the Orbitkey will stay compact and organized! Your keys will fit comfortably into any pocket or bag!
Special Locking Mechanism. Our custom designed locking mechanism solves the issues that normal screws have. It is specially created to stop your keys from coming undone over time and it also allows you to adjust how tight your stack of keys are. It has also been designed to complement the overall sophistication of the product.
Optional Attachment. In case you're wondering, Every Orbitkey comes with an additional attachment ring to carry bulkier and odd shaped items such as your car keys or bike lock keys! (no additional charge)
Packed with features. The Orbitkey is like a Swiss army knife for keys, spice up your Orbitkey with a USB stick or bottle opener!
Weight: approximately 25g with 3 keys
Dimension: 85mm long x 19mm wide (Overall when assembled)
Material: Locking Mechanism: High Quality Aluminium 7075
               Band: Double sided genuine leather or TPU Elastomer
Color: Leather: Tan/ Tan with white stitching/ Black/ Black with tan stitching 
           Elastomer (Rubber):  Grey, Pink or Aqua
Will my keys fit? You can use most standard keys with Orbitkey. If you happen to have keys with smaller hole diameter than 5mm, please let us know. We have a few tricks to make that work too!
PLAY

Our goal is to provide you with more band and accessories options. When we reach certain number of backers, we will be releasing more bands/ accessories for you to choose from. Please help us spread the word to make it happen! More stretch goals coming so stay tuned!
Although we are all-too-familiar with the “key ring” and grew up using it, it was far from perfect; it was noisy, it was unorganized, it damaged anything that came near it and it was unappealing! Everything the Orbitkey is not! We started trialling with different materials and designs. The initial design involved the use of Chicago screws, but we quickly found these to be unreliable (and unappealing) as they would come loose over time. We then set out to create something of our own — a tool that could withstand the test of time! Our newest model has a built in mechanism that prevents the device from coming undone accidentally. It can also be adjusted to fit a different number of keys. We tested many different materials for the band and finally settled on TPU rubber and leather. We wanted a material that is flexible yet strong enough to perform the movement of the Orbitkey, but, more importantly we needed something that would prevent keys from scratching our belongings.
 Why we need you
For the past 12 months we’ve been testing and refining the Orbitkey. All the manufacturers are lined up and ready to begin production. Your support will help fund the first production run and get the Orbitkey from our warehouse into your pocket! The funding will assist with the cost of tooling, manufacturing and distribution. We will also be using the funding to expand the range of bands available for you to choose from. In order to bring Orbitkey to life, we need your support. Not only does this mean pledging for an Orbitkey, but also sharing this project with your friends. Something as simple as tweeting about our page or sharing our Facebook page will go a long way to the success of Orbitkey. So please take a moment and click on the Facebook, Twitter and Instagram tabs at the top of the page and don’t keep Orbitkey a secret!
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
We will be working hard to promote the Orbitkey in a variety of ways, but we see our first challenge is getting the word out. We hope through the use of social media, blogs and you sharing this project, together we can drive enough traffic to make Orbitkey a success!

We have been testing the Orbitkey for 12 months and we have built several test prototypes with our manufacturer. We have worked hard to mitigate the risk of delays in production and delivery. We don’t anticipate any major setbacks and are confident that we will be able to deliver even if our goal was to be exceeded.

Having said that, we know that there may be unanticipated challenges along the way, and in the true spirit of crowd funding, we intend to be totally transparent with any hurdles that we encounter and will keep you up to date.

We anticipate to get the Orbitkey delivered to you by March 2014.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_userinfo: Meet our newest product (+free gift when you back us!)
updates.update_content:
Hi Orbitkey family,
Hope you’re keeping safe and well in this wild world.
We have just hit the launch button on our 5th campaign – Orbitkey Desk Mat is now live!
The Orbitkey Desk Mat was designed to help you create a more beautiful and organised desk space. And it’s even more valuable now, with many of us working from home.

updates.update_userinfo: Meet Our Newest Product – the Orbitkey Desk Mat
updates.update_content:
Hello Backers,
We have just hit the launch button on our 4th campaign – Orbitkey Nest is now live! This is our first leap to tackle organisation beyond keys – we hope you like it!
Orbitkey Nest - a portable and customisable desk organiser that helps you declutter and organise.

We’re excited to announce that our new campaign has just launched here on Kickstarter.

What I would suggest would be a hard plastic or metal frame in the shape of the thumbdrive. Then on the other side have clear plastic. At the back end of the key shape, have the bottom open, then have a small slip of paper in the shape of the key that you can slip in between the two pieces of plastic. You can see the writing through the clear plastic, it won't get worn or smudged unless the keys are dropped in a deep puddle. The paper will have a hole for the post to go through, so it will be kept in place between the two pieces of plastic. That way you have paper so you write/rewrite on it, strong plastic to protect the paper, and the paper is replaceable.

KS's TOS is very explicit that any issue between a backer and project creator is up to the parties to resolve. If a creator does not follow through on the project they should refund the backer's contribution. However, KS does not get involved, has no responsibility, and the only recourse for the backer is to sue. If you are a backer in the same country as the project creator then at least it is somewhat easier to pursue the legal option. However, I am not from Australia, so this is more of a concern for me for this project.

Recent Press:
- Mashable: "Tap Your Smartphone in Style with AEON’s Leather Touchpoint Gloves"
- Indecent Xposure: "Innovative Holiday Must Haves, AEON Attire's New Touchpoint Leather Gloves"
- Betakit: "Toronto’s AEON Attire Kickstarter Gloves Crushes Funding Goal"
-Techvibes: "Aeon Attire Creates Touch-friendly Leather Gloves That are 'as Smart as Your Phone'"
The Touchpoint Leather Gloves Feature:
1) ADVANCED TOUCHSCREEN TECHNOLOGY: Featuring innovative Nanotechnology that mimics the touch of a human hand to operate personal devices while staying warm and dry.
2) QUALITY CRAFTSMANSHIP: Handcrafted with exceptional quality combining 100% leather exterior with an extra soft fleece interior to provide unrivaled warmth and experience.
3) EXCEPTIONAL FIT + DESIGN: We've spent the past months improving our fits with leathersmiths and designers who have worked with leading leather glove brands. It's treated to be specifically windproof, water and soil-resistant, and offers excellent anti-microbial properties.
4) WHOLESALE PRICE: We're selling these gloves exclusively to you on Kickstarter, cutting out the the middlemen and traditional retail markups, to offer the gloves at the revolutionary price of $65.
5) OUR GUARANTEE: You'll instantly see and feel the difference when you put on the Touchpoint glove. We're so confident that we guarantee it with free returns for store credit (see full details below).
How It Works
Our gloves mimic conductive properties of the human skin; this makes it touchscreen compatible. The surface of the glove alone is enough to work on a touchscreen. Therefore, we've been able to line it with extra soft fleece to keep you warmer. The gloves have been designed to provide seamless control of touchscreens, stylishly.
What You get
1) Complete control of touchscreen devices.
2) Warm hands protected from the elements.
3) A beautifully designed glove that stands on it's own for aesthetic.
4) A timeless investment piece that ages, grows with your hand, and becomes more valuable over time.
5) No more taking off and on gloves to interact with your phone.
6) No scratches or smudges on your phone from your fingers.
Arrival Before Christmas Holidays!
And by far, one of the best holiday gifts for 2014. It's something that everyone needs and can make use of. The gloves will retail for over $120 and since they are new to the market, they make the perfect gift for that person who has everything. We will have them sent out by December 15th, way before Christmas arrives!


Our Story
Leather gloves have been keeping hands warm for centuries and are known for their durable exterior, insulation, and timeless look. But in light of recent technological advances, most gloves are no longer practical. These days, we need touchscreen technology when we're really doing anything with our phones. We need our gloves to keep us warm and perform even better for us!
We believe in creating accessories that exist in the space where fashion meets function. So, AEON Attire has created the Touchpoint Glove, premium leather gloves with nanotechnology that allows you to stay connected seamlessly and stylishly. Complete control at your fingertips.
I teamed up with leathersmiths and designers who had been working in the leather goods industry for over the past 8 years. The result was a new glove line that we developed to be one of the most comfortable, exceptionally designed, and amazingly functional leather gloves to date. Not only that, but by selling on Kickstarter, we're able to offer our gloves directly to customers at a revolutionary price of only $65. (Includes shipping in Canada)
Our Fits & Styles

The Tri-Line:
The Rider:
Rider sizes: 7", 8", 9"
The Quilt:
Quilt sizes: 6½", 7", 7½", 8"
If you are not sure about your glove size, measure the hand you normally write with at its widest point in inches (excluding the thumb), then round down to the nearest half or whole number - this will be your glove size.
Glove sizes come in half and whole numbers, between 7½ and 11 for men and 6 and 8½ for women. For example if your hand measures 8½ inches around its widest point (excluding the thumb), your glove size is 8½ (Note: one inch = 25.4mm).
Where gloves are sized S,M,L,and XL, the following guide will apply (measurements refer to your glove size, as calculated above)
For Men:- Small 7- 7½ Medium 8½ - 9 Large 9½
For Women:- Small 6 - 6½ Medium 7 - 7½ Large 8 - 8½
If you are between sizes, choose the smaller size. Gloves should be snug at first but will stretch.
Premium Craftsmanship & Detailing
We take pride in the exceptional quality of our gloves. We believe that the details matter and take great care in combining the best materials and craftsmanship in our products. Here are some of the highlights:
Care Instructions
Do not put them in a washing machine or tumble dryer. Do not wring, do not bleach, do not iron and do not dry clean. These gloves should not be machine washed. Gently hand wipe if needed.
Help Get Production Started
We're raising $2,500 to get production started for the Touchpoint premium leather glove line. This includes the costs to meet production minimums, top quality leather, improving a few stylistic and functional aspects to the prototypes. Both gloves will have 2 adjustable buttons for the wrist instead of just 1. We also realized that the gloves needed to be more fitted in the fingertips to increase control when we tested prototypes. We've already developed most of the project through with our own money and time but we need your help to improve and bring the collection to life. This is the final push! Please support us at whatever level you're comfortable with. In return, you can get a pair of our amazing gloves. And by selling directly to you online, we can offer you our wholesale price of $65 CAD(W/shipping in Canada) down from over $110.
Our Guarantee
Simply try the gloves on and we guarantee that you'll instantly feel the difference or the return is on us. This means that if you don't like the gloves for any reason, just email us and we will send you a pre-paid shipping label to send the gloves back to us. The gloves will need to be unworn and in their original packaging, and returned within 14 days. Upon receipt of the gloves, we will issue you full store credit to use on our website. Note that free returns only apply to domestic orders - international shipping costs more, so we aren't able to provide a pre-paid shipping label for international returns.
Join Us and Help Spread The Word
We're excited to get the AEON Touchpoint premium leather glove line launched on Kickstarter. After you support us, we would love it if you could help us spread the word and share our video with friends. You can find us on Facebook, Twitter, and Instagram (@AEONAttire). If you have any questions or just want to say hi, you can email us anytime at info@aeonattire.com.
Thank you so much for your support!

-Patrick

Music by Sweet Wave Audio www.sweetwaveaudio.co.uk
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
Timing is the biggest risk for us. We're expecting to get them all shipped out before December 11th. The good news is that we went through the major challenge of getting glove production started already. We have successfully funded a project on Indiegogo and raised over 11k. As a result, our supply chain and manufacturing procedures have been streamlined and we're ready to go. We're looking to reduce the risk of delay this time through a few additional changes as well:

1) First, we are staggering our delivery dates into batches according to when our customers place their orders.

2) We're also going to start getting production started immediately once we hit our goal of $2,500, rather than waiting until the campaign ends.

3) We simplified our product offering (3-4 sizes only) This significantly helps us simplify the manufacturing, and also lets us offer these leather gloves at such a low price.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_content:
Hi all,

Together, we made winter phone use easier for so many people. Thank you again for backing the project. The team and I learned a lot, and return to Kickstarter better and wiser with a new project: Wallet One.

 A backer told me that their phone was only as good as the battery life. This struck me, and I began to play with external power sources that were actually fashionable and useful. So, here we are: Wallet One, the wallet that charges your phone, is anti-RFID, and holds cards, cash, and more. It hasn’t been live long, but the response has been great:  


 We've been using our working prototypes constantly, and can't leave the house without them. Mobile power is great. Together, let's make this happen!

 PS-- I know there were some delivery bugs with the last batch of Touchpoint gloves, and I’m sorry (if you still have any questions, please email me at AEONAttire@gmail.com). To make sure this doesn’t happen this time, we’ve teamed up with a professional courier service instead of going by post (and by hand!).

Talk soon, guys!

Patrick

Hey, guys! If you recall that Canadian power project from today? It's went live at 6pm (just now), and 69/99 super Early Bird spots remain. 
If you're the type of person who enjoys peace of mind, this one's for you. 
https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/yuan/prometheus-unlimited-power
Patrick

I hope you’re doing well! It’s been a while, and I wanted to thank you again for your support of the Touchpoint gloves. 
Many of you have asked about other projects on my radar. Here’s one I’m particularly excited about (created by a Canadian designer). Prometheus, the little black box bringing unlimited power to your devices.

updates.update_content:
Hi, Kickstarter!
Upon the wrap-up of the Touchpoint glove campaign on December 8, our team packaged and mailed over 460 pairs of gloves, spending days at the post office to get them to you in time for the holidays.
For many, it worked out just fine. And for others, we still owe you your gloves and I apologize for that. This is because we ran out of stock of gloves in the Rider style.

Sincerely from the AEON team,

We wish you all the best in 2014 with all of your endeavors big and small. We know that each and every one of you all have the spark, ability, and drive to do the things that you have your hearts and minds set on.

 We are wishing you all a very fulfilling New Year : ). We'd like to thank all of you for supporting us and our company and helping us reach higher ground in our own personal journeys in life.

campaign.story:
After the campaign visit us at www.TRAKLINE.com
               THE BEST BELT YOU'LL EVER OWN.  HERE'S WHY...
1 - PERFECT FIT:  In this ever-changing world, you need a belt that adapts with you, every 1/4 inch of the way. Trakline belts conform to your exact waist size, every time you put it on.

2 - ADJUSTABILITY:  It's true, Trakline belts are 8X's more adjustable than traditional belts. That's because they offer over 40 sizing positions to choose from. Traditional belts have only 5.
3 - NO HOLES:  That's right.  No more worn-out, stretched-out, augmented, poor-fitting belt holes to deal with. Instead a modern, hidden trak system that lasts longer and conforms to your precise waist size. 
4 - QUALITY:  We only make products that we want to wear >> and we like quality stuff. The buckles are solid stainless steel and the belts are full-grain leather.

featured on:  Dude I Want That, Gear Hungry, ShoppersBase & Crowdfund Mafia
                                visit us at  www.TRAKLINE.com
SO HOW'S IT WORK ?
When a Trakline belt is pulled snug around your waist, the buckle locks firmly at your exact waist size - every time you put it on. To remove or adjust, pull the small tab under the buckle.  It's that simple.  Not only do Trakline belts fit much better than traditional belts, but they're easier to take on and off.  Watch the video and see for yourself - because seeing is believing... 
OUR STORY
Two years ago my wife bought me an expensive, designer belt for my birthday. She wanted to upgrade my wardrobe. Unfortunately for me, the belt holes didn't line up with my waist size that day.  So I did what a lot of guys have done, I added a couple holes.  But in the process >> I ruined the belt.  Needless to say, my wife was not happy.
                           Visit us online at www.TRAKLINE.com
INSPIRATION
I learned 2 simple lessons that day.  First, never puncture any gift from your wife and second >>  belt holes don't work all that well.  Not much of a surprise, considering they were introduced during the "Dark Ages" and haven't changed much since.  
Consider that as you work, walk, eat, sleep, play - your waist size naturally fluctuates with you.  Unfortunately, traditional belts only offer you 1 inch spaced holes. Who's waist fluctuates 1 inch at a time?  Not mine.  So I made it my mission to find a better fitting belt with style.  But when I scoured the marketplace for a product that could adapt to my ever-changing waist size AND look good doing it... I came up empty. That's when I got inspired to create a whole new kind of belt.
                                  visit us at  www.TRAKLINE.com
THE BOTTOM LINE
Every man knows that belt holes aren't fun to deal with.  They stretch-out, wear-out and rarely seem to fit just right.  Don't you think you deserve a belt that not only looks great, but offers a perfect fit every time you put it on ?   ...I think so too.

CREATING A NEW KIND OF BELT
After a year and a half of researching, designing, redesigning, prototyping and testing >> we came up with the TRAKLINE BELT.
                                visit us at  www.TRAKLINE.com
First - we employed a simple, more effective trak system.  This 10-inch trak is sewn into the back of the belt and completely hidden from sight.  Next, we designed a unique (patent pending) buckle to interface with the belt and give you over 40 sizing positions all in 1/4 inch increments.  That 8X's more adjustable than your traditional belt.  When a Trakline belt is pulled snug around your waist, the buckle locks firmly at your exact waist size.  The result = a simple, stylish belt that offers the perfect fit, every time. (see photos)
WHAT ABOUT QUALITY ?
We designed the Trakline belt to last by using the best available materials. The buckle is constructed of solid stainless steel and the belt is full-grain leather with double stitching.
HOW DO YOU KNOW I'LL LOVE IT ?
When we completed the final samples, we handed them out to a few friends and associates to test for us.  We asked them to wear the belts for few months in the "real-world" and give us their feedback.  The only problem was, when we went to get the belts back, no one wanted to give them up.  All the guys loved their new belts.  They said it was the best fitting belt they ever had and they didn't want to go back to their old belts.  So we feel like we can say with confidence >> this is the best belt you'll ever own and you're going to love it.
WE NEED YOUR SUPPORT
We're ready to launch Trakline and take it to stores, but we need your support to do it. Specifically, we need the funds to pay for the first production run and get the belts into the marketplace.
                                visit us at  www.TRAKLINE.com
REWARDS
In return for your support, we want you to be one of the first to own a Trakline Belt !  Check out the Rewards column for the styles and backer pricing.  In addition, We're offering FREE SHIPPING to all U.S. orders and $15 for International destinations outside the U.S.
GIFT FOR GUYS
Trakline Belts make a great gift that guys can wear and appreciate everyday... not like that tie you're thinking about buying him.
BELT DETAILS
At the moment, we have 4 buckle styles (Icon, Intrepid, Evolve & Eureka) and 2 belt colors (black or brown) to choose from (see photos).  Belts are 1 3/8 inches (35mm) wide and should fit thru most jean or dress pant loops. Currently our belts fit waist sizes UP TO 44 inches (118 cm).  We will have larger sizes and women’s styles in the near future on our website - http://www.Trakline.com
On the back of each belt we've printed waist sizes to show you precisely where to trim your Trakline belt (with scissors) . The trimmed end then snaps securely into the buckle.  It's easy.  It's best to try the belt on before trimming.  The purpose for trimming, is to get your belt length within your "waist range", then the 10 inch trak system can create your perfect fit every day.
THE TEAM
Karl Kozak: Sales & Marketing
Mauro Bove: Manufacturing & Quality Control
Steve Olson: Product & Web Design
The three of us have been good friends and business associates for over 10 years. We often share new ideas and look to each other for advice.  So when I approached Mauro and Steve with my idea to create a new kind of men's belt, both thought it was a great idea who's time had come and jumped at the chance to get involved.   Not just because of our friendship, but because they mutually agreed that traditional belts were not only outdated, but that there had to be a better method. And I wanted them on board because of their skill sets and expertise. I thought they were perfect for this project.  For the past 15 years Mauro has been in product manufacturing and quality control.  As a result, he's manufactured a wide variety of high-quality retail products for some of Americas biggest retailers.  Steve on the other hand, is an all-around talented designer, who's been crucial in creating our product designs, drawings and the website.  My background has been in business management and sales.  Over the past 20 years, I've successfully launched, grown, managed and sold several companies.  Together, the three of us make a great team.
                              visit us at  www.TRAKLINE.com
PRODUCTION PLAN
Once we complete the Kickstarter campaign we will immediately commence production on our first order of Trakline belts. Based on the factories estimate, the manufacturing process should take between 30-40 days to complete.  To save money, we're making the belts at a responsible factory in Southern China that we've employed before with great success.  One of our partners (Mauro) will personally be on hand to oversee and ensure that the best quality standards are met. Once the production is completed, we will ship the belts to our office in San Diego, California, and then repackage individual orders to ship out to backers within about 1-2 weeks.  It's that simple.
                              visit us at  www.TRAKLINE.com
THANK YOU !
Thanks in advance for your support and for taking the time to learn about our new product, we really appreciate it !

Trakline's unique buckles are Patent Pending.  Trakline is a trademark of The Standard.
What some folks are saying about us:
"Trakline banished the meager five, 1"-spaced holes of traditional belts from their full-grain leather strips, and replaced them with a secure Trak system boasting 40 sizing positions at 1/4" increments. The result: a perfect fit at my precise waist size, whether it's Liquid Diet Monday or Chicken & Waffles Saturday." - Dude I Want That.com !

"What we love about Trakline belts is that each belt fits to your exact waist size, every time you put it on. So if you are having a fat day, there is no need to punch an extra hole to give you a little more breathing space, just pop on a Trakline belt and fit it to your exact waist size." - ShoppersBase.com
"Never again worry about being between belt holes. Trakline Belts are on Kickstarter, reinventing the wheel for men’s belts. They fit your exact waist size every time with over 40 positions!" - The Crowdfund Mafia
                               visit us at  www.TRAKLINE.com
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
On the positive side, we've been involved in manufacturing and product development for almost 20 years and know the pitfalls and snags to watch out for. We've also paid for ALL the design fees, molds, tooling and prototypes necessary and have solid, existing relationships with the factory involved.

Still, we understand that all this doesn’t completely eliminate all the risks going forward.

Timing is the biggest risk in our case. In the best-case scenario, we will have belts in hand 4 weeks after our Kickstarter is over and turn these around in as little as 2-3 weeks, getting the belts in the mail on time. If not, the worst case scenario is that we could be delayed another 1-2 weeks.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

@Sean Kelly The buckle has a plate where it houses 'teeth' to keep your belt in place. Get a small flat head screwdriver and pry it open. Once you have it open, you'll see the teeth I am talking about. Once you measured and cut, put the cut end back into the buckle and press the plate down so that the teeth can grab the belt. Then try your belt on and repeat the cut if necessary. Good luck!

Got my belt and two buckles in and they work great! To tag along with Joe Dane's (Jane Doe? Nice.) comment, please make a belt for CCW (Concealed Carry Weapon). I'm a firearm enthusiast and as such, my only complaint about this belt is it isn't suited for CCW. No fault of the belt mind you, it wasn't designed as such. But if you made a belt for CCW it would be well received. The only design change needed would be the edition of a stiff/ridged plastic insert in between the leather pieces. This design insert is used in BLACKHAWK, 5.11, Bladetech and countless other dedicated holster belts. And honestly, belts using this idea are, in my opinion, more comfortable even when not carrying gear on them. You have an excellent product here and I would love to have a more specifically useful version available. Thank you!
Anyway - awesome product. Much success in the future. I'm anticipating seeing these all over. I'll be able to say I knew you way back when.

I'm aware you can't change the wording of the actual pledge tier once it's been pledged to, but if you wish to allow the early bird backers the option to choose between the four buckles, you can simply give them that option in the reward survey you send after the project is over. Lots of projects add things as a campaign goes along that they can't update the pledge tiers to reflect (e.g., a game project reaches a stretch goal to release on a platform that was not originally listed in the pledge tiers). Kickstarter's fine with it as long as you're not *removing* rewards that have already been listed. Ultimately the choice is yours; I'm not going to pull my support if you elect not to, I just thought it'd be nice if the early birds were able to get the same choice in buckles as the rest of the backers.

campaign.story:
“…this product reduces notifications to its barest element, which is useful and important, even if it might have pissed off Jobs”. TECH CRUNCH
 “…a low price for any iPhone accessory, and this one actually does something other than just make it look a little cooler”. LOCKER GNOME
“It might be time to see things differently. Like literally see. Here’s myLED – A tiny LED add-on for your iDevice”. MASHABLE
 “...the quirky and simple light system will be a real hit among some iPhone owners”. SHINY SHINY
“Better battery life, widgets, dedicated call answer/end button, dedicated camera shutter button and a notification LED … I’ll soon be able to mark one of those features off my list if the myLED Kickstarter project gets fully funded” THE GADGETEER
“myLED looks like a fantastic little device to remove the frustration of checking for notifications every minute or so when we’re expecting something”. N3RDABL3
What Is myLED?
myLED is an external notification light for iPhones and iPads that flashes to alert you of notifications such as missed calls, emails and social network updates. It allows you to keep informed of activity on your phone without having to switch on the screen.
myLED is packed with a ton of functionality and fits seamlessly into iOS devices. It sits inside the headphone jack to ensure full visibility from every direction, and when there is an interaction such as an email or missed call, myLED starts flashing to let you know.
myLED in real life size
myLED in operation
myLED is an incredibly simple solution to an issue many of the 400 million iPhone and iPad users have: notifications. There is no convenient way to get alerts for activities such as missed calls, emails and social network updates on iOS - if you’ve used a BlackBerry or Android and have seen them flash to alert you, you'll understand the difference. Phone notifications are a small detail however it can cause much aggravation to check the phone for new activity every few minutes. 
We have come to face the challenge of creating myLED from a personal need. We used to have Blackberrys and got accustomed to the extremely handy notification light. When we migrated to the iPhone and the iPad we felt the devices had a major deficiency in the lack of external notification i.e. to check for missed activities you must switch the screen on. This can be particularly inconvenient, for example when the device is on silent mode such as in the office, at meetings, lectures or when you are in noisy environments. 
From this need we decided to find a better way to get notifications from our iPhones and iPads; so we created myLED.
How Does myLED Work?
myLED is a elegantly designed accessory with a micro-LED connected to the audio jack. You insert it into an iPhone or iPad, switch on the myLED app, and set what you’d like it to notify you of - missed calls, and Twitter updates for example. Now those incoming notifications  will trigger myLED to flash, and it will continue flashing until you see what you’ve missed - alternatively you can program myLED to flash for a given time only.
How to use myLED
Since myLED allows you to customize different blinking patterns for the various notifications, it is easy to see what kind of activity has happened at first sight. 
Furthermore, myLED comes with a headphones clip so that when not in use it can be safely stowed.
myLED headphone clip
myLED is a super-useful complement to any iOS device, so small and intuitive that it will feel as a natural part of your iPhone or iPad.
What Kind Of Alerts Can I Get On myLED?
   Missed Calls
   FaceTime
   Emails 
   Skype
   Facebook
   Twitter
Where We Are At
We have been designing and developing myLED for a couple of months applying lean methods to the entire process. We set out with a goal of creating an MVP (Minimal Viable Product) and to complete a proof of concept.
  CAD model of the jack's head
We successfully built a number of prototypes, iterated through a few designs and developed a basic working iOS app that enables myLED to run on the iPhone and iPad. 
myLED prototype
The next stage is to launch the project here on Kickstarter in order to gauge interest in the product. While we are generating funds we can complete the development of the myLED jack and start to produce packaging concepts and detailed plans for the app architecture. As soon as funding is available to use, manufacture can commence.
Project Timeline
Why We Need You…
We are raising money to revolutionize the way notifications work on iOS.
Our team is in advanced discussion with a manufacturer and in order to produce myLED on an industrial level we need to address the following:
Tooling, manufacturing and assembly: the production of the bespoke 3.5mm jack requires special tooling, and this costs several thousand dollars alone. The soldering process for connecting the micro-LEDs to the jack needs high precision and it is also highly expensive.
Injection molding: to manufacture the white casing we need to create a custom-made mold for plastic injection.
App development: we need to continue developing our software in order to reach full functionality, and for this we’ve found highly skilled and experienced developers who are working for us.
Finally, we have to package and ship myLED to you.

  FAQs
Does myLED flash in different colors? Currently myLED produces a red flash. We choose to create myLED with a single color in-order to minimize the size of the device, which otherwise would require significantly more electronic components. This design also ensures minimal power consumption that may otherwise significantly affect battery life on an iOS device.
Does myLED alert for text messages? At this point we are facing challenges making text messages work with myLED so we expect the initial app to ship only with notifications for Calls, Emails, FB, Twitter and Skype.
Can I use earphones while myLED is in use? No, myLED is inserted into the headphones input and so headphones can’t be used together with myLED - that said, the whole point of myLED is to alert you to phone activity when you’re away from it. Also, a plastic clip to hold myLED to your headphones set when not in use will be shipped as part of your myLED package.
Do I need to install software on my iOS device for myLED to work? Yes, you install a free app that interfaces and controls the settings for myLED. The app will be free for download to all our backers.
Does the app need to be "on" for myLED to work? Yes, myLED app needs to run in the background and we are currently working on further minimizing battery consumption. Our tests on iPad 3 showed 80hrs of battery life with myLED app running in the background and wi-fi data connection switched on.
Is myLED compatible with all iOS devices? Currently myLED has been successfully tested with iPhone 3, 3S, 4, 4S, 5 iPad 2, The New iPad. 
I want to order more than one myLED – how can I do it? Due to the new Kickstarter rules for manufacturing projects we have not been able to insert more rewards for multiple quantities (for example a x2, x3, x10 packs etc). However you can pledge a sum equal to the price of the reward desired  x the number of myLEDs you want. We intend to do a survey at the end of the funding to collect addresses and make sure everyone receive what they pledged for.
Also, please contact us directly if you are interested in a large quantity purchase (x10 myLEDs or more) to secure the best deal.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
By pledging you get to be involved in an innovative project and we endeavour to reward you for that, but you also agree to share the residual development risks and challenges with us. 

iOS development
One risk is app approval by Apple for the AppStore. 
Gaining access to notifications on the phone log is blocked for most apps and we are having to work hard to find solutions that don’t use this method.
While we will work tirelessly to create an app that is acceptable to Apple and feel that we can do so, we cannot make guarantees since this process is outside of our control. 
The final development of the app will continue as soon as the funds are available to us, and we will be submitting our app for approval at the first opportunity. However, given the nature of our delivery programme, we will be likely to hear back from Apple once the product and packaging production is well underway and these activities will absorb almost the entirety of the money raised on kickstarter. For this reason, if we come up against an insurmountable problem with the app approval, we will be unable to offer refunds.
Unexpected software development obstacles could be a risk too, although we have carried out a large number of experiments with our developer to ensure the feasibility of all the features and details that are still to be implemented in the final app.

myLED working with text messages
We have run into a challenge getting the app working with the text message client. We are exploring alternative solutions and will inform our pledgers on progress throughout software development.

Manufacturing process
Shipping time can be delayed subject to manufacturing delays. Issues in any part of the production process can cause delays to expected shipping date. We will keep our pledgers fully informed of every stage of our progress.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_content:
Dear Backers,
We are happy to announce the release of the completely redesigned myLED app (version 3.0.1) in the AppStore!
You can grab it here.

Dear backers, 
It’s been a while since we last posted. In this post we will summarize our exciting journey on Kickstarter. 
Completed Our Kickstarter Thanks To YOU! 
It is now a year since we launched our campaign, I want to thank all of you for taking part in this journey. Some of you may have seen myLED as a cool gadget to order for your iPhone or iPad but it is a lot more then just that. You chose to support a bunch of anonymous guys with a vision for an improved daily experience with your favorite device that you use all of the time. You trusted us with your money and asked us to build the experience you most wanted. We accepted your trust with great admiration and put six months into developing myLED.

Dear Backers,
We shipped all the outstanding orders on Sunday September 29th. We used Singapore post with tracking numbers for the shipping - they have a good reputation (unlike Italian Post ;) and the tracking numbers should help. We emailed the people on our reship list with their tracking number and we hope your reshipped myLED gets to you soon.
New twitter screen

updates.update_userinfo: Help Us Make myLED Better – Answer 13 Quick Survey Questions
updates.update_content:
Dear backers,

The latest on shipping:
As most of you know we shipped out all the Kickstarter orders by July 5th.
We got many reports by backers from all over about orders that did not arrived. We can assure they were all shipped out. The choice of using Poste Italiane is proving fatal since the estimated shipping times are turning out quite unreliable. Also, they did not offer the option of using tracking numbers for batch shipping adding to the issue.

We have been recording all mentions of missing packages. We already started with re-shipping (already 40 orders were re-shipped) whereas some backers have received their shipment in the meantime and informed us.

Hi everyone,

First of all any thanks to all of you for the many comments, feedbacks, tweets, fb posts, videos, reviews we have been receiving since shipping begun. To see your enthusiasm is really fantastic and is a phenomenal source of energy for our team!

updates.update_userinfo: General update and EU devices compatibility
updates.update_content:
Dear backers,
we finally shipped all the myLEDs ordered on KS, so you can expect to receive yours soon!

updates.update_userinfo: myLED shipping completed and customer support
updates.update_content:
Dear backers, 
After months of preparations and hard work designing myLED we finally received the first batch of 500 units from the factory in China at Fede’s home in Italy last Thursday. We had the factory send out the first 500 units so we can test them and start shipping the first ones out. The rest are on the way and should arrive at the end of this week.

Hi everyone,
 
and many thanks for the continuing support you are providing us with your feedbacks and comments. Every day we are receiving a huge amount of messages here on Kickstarter and through our social media pages on Facebook, Twitter and G+ and to hear your impressions and feedbacks on our work, on the way we are managing this project, on the app and of course on the product is fantastic and extremely valuable to us.
 
We look forward to hearing your feedback and impressions on the product and we really can't wait to ship it to you. As we said in our previous updates this should happen soon, and so we hope to hear your first comments as myLED early adopters in the next few weeks.
 
In the meantime we have started to collect comments  on the software in order to analyse and implement the suggestions received. Although it may seem straightforward, the code behind myLED app is very complex  and our developer had to invest a lot of time and energy to gain the approval from Apple.

Hi backers,

A short update to inform you about the myLED progress.
We are waiting to receive the first batch of myLEDs from the factory. These were scheduled to arrive on June 8th but we have been informed that there have been some delays in the production line last week – this was due to a misalignment in the cap assembly process which caused many pieces to be rejected during QA tests. The issue should now be resolved and the production of the first batch should come to the end this coming week and will then be shipped to Italy from where we will package and send myLEDs to you.

campaign.story:
Hello, 
Adam here from Machine Era Co. I’ve come up with an innovative and stylish way of carrying your keys without the use of the cumbersome, and let’s be honest, not very attractive carabiner. 
All my prototyping is done manually on a machine made for the war effort in the 1940’s. In order to get this product to you at the lowest possible price, I need your help to do a production run.

Form & Function
I believe good design should be attractive and well-crafted without sacrificing function. By using strong materials and clean lines, my aim is to create a useful piece that can be enjoyed and used daily. If you’re going to use something everyday it should be good. 
The slots are designed to hold securely to a belt loop, but still able to detach easily. I have never had one come off without intentionally detaching it. 

Materials and Process
Cut and machined from a solid block of stainless steel. Not die cast. This  method produces a stronger, better quality, more consistent product than casting steel into various shapes.

Finish
Each piece is hand finished to ensure quality. It will never rust, corrode, or wear out. When you hand it down to your grandchildren, it will look like it did when you first bought it. 
As with anything that is attached to a keys, normal wear and scratches will happen. Because the KeySquare is fabricated from stainless steel, it allows any scratches to be quickly buffed out with any household scotch pad or small grit sandpaper. 

Design Features
 Looks good with casual or dress 
 No moving parts to wear out 
 You’ll always have a bottle opener at the ready 
 Small enough to fit comfortably inside a pocket 
 Made from durable stainless steel 
 Holds securely on a belt loop with enough reach to pocket your keys
 Made in USA
 Weight: 1 ounce

Show your support and get some of these rad coasters 
Special Edition Kickstarter Coasters made from solid aluminum
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
I have a background in manufacturing, metal fabrication and experience running production jobs. Having done the actual work of manufacturing, I know the kinds of problems that arise in the shop and how to deal with them quickly and efficiently. 

The biggest challenge for the KeySquares is the finishing process. Each one is sanded and buffed by hand. Although this method is time consuming, it ensures the highest quality. To compensate for the time this process takes, the delivery date is February. 

I've designed the manufacturing process to work with local small businesses. Every aspect of the project with be manufactured locally in Richmond, Va without the use of off-shore sourcing or sacrificing quality. Go USA.

The success of this project depends heavily on getting the word out. Every blog or social networking post counts, so please share. Thanks for your support.


Cheers,
Adam
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_userinfo: All New Machine Era Project Live Now!
updates.update_content: We're excited to announce our latest and greatest project: The Field Pen

updates.update_userinfo: Introducing the all new Ti5 Slim Wallet
updates.update_content:
We're super excited to share our latest project: Ti5 Slim Wallet
It's been a few years since the original Machine Era Wallet release. Since then we've been listening to your feedback and requests. Check out our project page for more info. This new design has some great features. And yes, it's made from aerospace grade titanium.

We've finally completed the Kickstarter Keysquare project!
We're tying up loose ends with address changes, mailing issues, etc.
If you still have not received your keysquare, email adam@machine-era.com with your reward tier and up to date address info.

We have 90% of the keysquares out. If you're in the 10% don't worry, we're projected to finish the project in two weeks. 
Once we fulfill all of the rewards, I'll send an update letting you know. After that, if you still haven't received your reward, then contact me via email- adam@machine-era.com 
Thanks to everyone for the feedback! Let us know when you get it- post a comment!

Hello Everyone,
We're happy to say that we have 1000 keysquares packaged and shipped! We have another batch of 500 going out next week. They will soon be in your hands. We're knocking these out as fast as we can. Special thanks to Brad, our shipping manager for all his help.

I think the thing that the people below are forgetting about is that it's not just cutting the key squares into a rough shape out of the stock. After the rough shape has been cut they then have to have the internal part hollowed out and then sanded down. So while yes cutting the blanks may only take a few hours it takes longer to machine out the inner part of the square and then sand them down.
