Risks and challenges
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_userinfo: Latest project update from Lance T. Miller
updates.update_content:
Hi everyone, I just wanted to drop a little note to let you all know about a very special project I am working on. The best news is its right here on Kickstarter and you're all welcome to participate. I've been contacted by a Hollywood production team to create a highly detailed deck of cards that will be used as the main prop for a TV show pilot!
Plot: Tommy Blades, is a young, aspiring magician who travels to Harbor city after the mysterious disappearance of his father and the murder of his mother. He quickly attains fame and climbs the ladder of Casinos to become the city's leading act. He combines his unique style of magic with the sword work he learned from a wandering desert warrior on his travels to the city. However, strange instances begin to occur in Tommy’s life, and he soon realizes that his well developed talents are nothing compared to a hidden power he harbors. A potential that would have the leaders of the earth seeking him out for the source of his incredible gift.

Folks, please take a look at your spam folders and add: info@lancetmiller.com as a safe sender. This is the email I am using to send everyone shipping confirmations. If you've not already received your packages, most other packages are shipping out tomorrow: Monday October 1st, and will be to you soon. 

Please double check your addresses in your shipping confirmation. We've made every effort to correct people's addresses as they've emailed us. However, there is still a chance we've not received notification about your specific address change. If your confirmation email shows a different shipping address than you wish to receive your package, please email me immediately!!! 

If any mail gets returned due to address changes that we've not received notification about, there will be a charge to re-mail those packages. 

Thank you all for your continued support, and communication. 

- Lance

OK. The biggest travel section of my year is done. Here's what it looked like briefly: (4 days and over 39 hours on the road) I had the week before packed with travel as well but not quite this intense. I know my travel bears little relevance to you receiving your rewards (aside from preventing me from packaging them), but a lot of you have come to love the craziness that is my life so I am sharing this. If you don't want to read about the schedule just skip to the last paragraph in this update. ;)
OK. The biggest travel section of my year is done. Here's what it looked like briefly: (4 days and over 39 hours on the road)

updates.update_userinfo: Travel section done. Onto reward processing!
updates.update_content: Actually, seriously, it's not party time, I can't help but be excited.

Hello Everyone! I had an amazing time in Cincinnati this week. Whilst on site at USPCC I got the shipping cleared up and they are already on their way to my house!!! So what does that mean? That means that as soon as I get the decks, we will begin fulfillment. Kickstarter Backers of course will be the #1 priority. You guys know how I roll.

So what you'll see is this: I will have the decks very early this week, and
Mike (http://www.bmpokerworld.com/),
Jason (the1eyedjack.com) and
John ()
will get their decks at the same time. That's called drop shipping and that doesn't mean that I don't care about you guys, it's just how the retail world works. They get shipped factory direct so they can have them for the launch date. Other than that, all other decks will be shipped from me to backers and my pre-order customers on my site and you all should know by now, I won't sleep until everyone has their packages. Especially after this wait.

The official launch date will be September 25th, but all Kickstarter backer's decks will be shipped prior to this date! 

- Lance
The day has finally come! The cards are all printed and shiny looking :D

Hello Everyone,
Great News! USPCC emailed yesterday and said that the Black and White Edition cards will be printed the week of August 6th and will ship within the following 2-3 weeks!!! 

So, now that we have an official timeline, I will begin releasing details and trailers for the effects that come with the decks. Make sure to pay particular attention to my Facebook page: http://facebook.com/lancemillerdecks and the main Kickstarter project update thread for more info.

USPCC projects can run into problems even after the printing has started. It could take 4-6 weeks for them to be printed, or it could take 2-3 more months. campaign.story:
WE LOVE OUR LOYAL BACKERS!!!!

We are happy to announce that we have been SUCCESSFULLY FUNDED after only ONE WEEK!!!!
& the iLIDmk-1 is OFFICIALLY GOING INTO PRODUCTION!!!
A Huge Thank thank you to all of our amazing backers, we couldn't have done it without you!
We'll keep you posted with all the cool updates like this one as we go through production process with cool pics & video's to come.

You can also follow our progress on our Facebook page & by joining the conversation on twitter @iLID_iPhonecase
If you haven't pre ordered your iLIDmk-1 yet its not too late!! you still have a couple of days left to take advantage our our discounted prices & free LIMITED EDITION 1GB USB stick!!
  ORDER NOW & RECEIVE YOUR SPECIAL GIFT CARD FOR CHRISTMAS
                                    (ILIDMK-1 case shipping in January)

Welcome to our funding page!
We have a great idea but we need your help to turn it into a real product.  The iLIDmk-1 will retail for $39.95 but you can now get one for just $30! + FREE 1GB World's thinnest USB stick exclusive to our Kickstarter supporters!
We have a patent pending product we're proud of and believe in, but it's not complete! We need your support.

Our goal on Kickstarter is clear... we must help humanity with their bulky pockets, allowing everyone to dance, walk, run & travel without being weighed down!

We must raise enough support to take the iLIDmk-1 through the rest of design and final product development.
Young, Australian and on the hunt for ways to reduce the clutter in our pockets, we hit on the idea to create a hinged-back iPhone case that could hold key, cards and cash.
          The iLID iPhone Case is the world’s thinnest iPhone wallet.               

What is the iLIDmk-1 World’s thinnest iPhone Wallet?
Our case consists of 2 thin profile polycarbonate shells that are joined together to create a hinged iPhone Wallet. Inside is a specially designed money clip. 
·       Only 17mm thin & feather lite at 30g
·       Main bay designed to hold up to 3cards
·       Money clip for holding your cash
·       Top bay can hold your key, an SD memory card or your Second Sim card!
                                         Doubles as a Kickstand!

Reducing everyday carry has been satisfying for us, At only 17mm thin this case is barely noticeable in your pocket.
 FREE 1GB World's thinnest USB exclusive to our Kickstarter supporters!
Why all that money?As we've found out, tooling is expensive! We need to reach our $10,000 funding goal in order to pay for it! This is where you come in, by pledging, backing, sharing the love on Facebook & twitter or pre ordering you can help us do the the seemingly impossible!
           Please help support us & make this awesome case a reality!

By raising support for us not only will you receive your very own iLIDmk-1 AND the world's thinnest 1GB USB stick, you'll also look just that little bit sexier walking down the street ;-) Bulky pockets begone!!

As a bonus to our Kickstarter supporters we are also providing the World's thinnest USB stick!
Please spread the word on Facebook & Twitter by clicking the buttons under  our video at the top of the page.

Warm regards,
Darren & Simon

PS FREE SHIPPING TO AUSTRALIA & USA!!

updates.update_userinfo: Your iLID iPhone Wallet Has Been Shipped!!
updates.update_content:
Hi,
We have officialy received word from our good friends at fulfillrite.com that they have begun shipping out their iLID iPhone Wallets!

Thank you for your patience, we'll be releasing a final update in the coming days, just couldn't wait to tell everyone!!

best,
The iLID Team

updates.update_userinfo: “iLIDs On A Plane” - iLIDs Dispatched From China!!!
updates.update_content:
Hi guys,
Thank you so much for your patience,
We are happy to announce the ilids have left the factory in china and are being sent to our fulfillment houses!!!
From fulfillment they will be shipped off individually to your personal address and you will receive a tracking number in your email from this point.
We’ll send out our next update when our fulfillment houses have acknowledged their arrival.

Hi!

We've finally got our photography back, (our project got pushed aside due to their commitments with larger clients). But not to worry we have great news!

As you can see the images below detail our final product, & its amazing!
We've also gone above and beyond here and secured a rubberised soft touch material, whilst adding significantly to our cost base, we believe it's well worth it!

We have had a number of emails asking us when we're finally going to ship & rightfully so. (it's killing us that it's taken soo long to get these crazy cases out! Just seems like one delay after another).
 
BUT Finally the day has come!

We have just received word from our manufacturer that our order is due for completion in 3-4 days. After a rocky start the manufacturer has managed to secure the correct plastic blend needed for production (took them longer than expected)
A set back that wasn't helped by a few public holidays thrown into the mix. But,



As it stands, once the iLID's have finished production over the next few days, they will then be packed up & transported to our fulfilment houses (takes a few days in transit). From there they will be dispatched from the fulfilment house in country to your door.

To our dear & loyal supporters…
Latest iLIDs are AMAZING!!!

Production is LIVE

& We have signed off for an initial order of 40,000 units!!

Very exciting news!
Lead time is two weeks.

In the mean time we have sent our samples off to Professional photographers.
(We’ll post an update with the pics as soon as they arrive).

The shots will then be uploaded to our website, featuring in both the new product page & fresh slider images on the home page.

We’ll see you next time when our photography arrives!!

Take care,

The iLID Team

Hi,
Great news our manufacturer is “very happy with the new iLIDs," and shipped the latest samples off last week for our approval.
Unfortunately there has been a delay at Sydney airport and we won’t receive them until Monday.

updates.update_userinfo: Manufacturer is “very happy with the new iLIDs"
updates.update_content:
Hi,
We hope you have had a safe & enjoyable Easter break from everyone at the iLID team.
It’s been a couple of weeks since our last update. Where we found out our first run had irregularities preventing us from sending off our beloved iLIDs.
We would like to sincerely thank everyone for the emails of generous support & kind feedback.

So……  We have just received the first 2000 piece production run and have found irregularities in the first batch of iLIDmk-1’s.
We have deliberated (stressed) over this situation and have unfortunately decided that we will not ship these iLIDs.
Whilst the majority appears to be ok, we don’t want to put your valuables at potential risk by shipping a batch that we are not completely happy with.

G'day guys,
We know its been a while since our last update, we've been crazy busy getting these iLIDs ready and whilst we encountered a few hurdles along the way with tooling, a bad batch of money clips (or two) and public holidays we're glad to say that we are finally...
IN PRODUCTION!!!!!!!

G'day Guys,
Thanks for you patience as we head for the home stretch with this project.
We understand that you are eager to get your hands on the case. Rest assured SO ARE WE!!!
Please be mindful that when you back a kickstarter campaign you are backing an idea. Not a ship in 24 HRS campaign. Kickstarter was designed to develop ideas and concepts that resonate with the backer. Turning an idea into a reality takes time, energy and reworks. It takes time to the process.

LIke many others, I was disappointed by how long this project took. However, I have to say I'm very happy with the results. I've tried other cases and they were too big and bulky. The iLid is definitely the smallest wallet case I've seen. I use it to hold a credit card and a debit card in the main storage area, a drivers license on the money clip side, and a house key. I love that all I need to carry is the iLid case and a money clip. The wallet part is actually a little tough to open, but I think that it will loosen up a little over time and I'd rather it was a little tight rather than pop open at the wrong time. I'm sure the pressure was on to release something sooner, but I'm betting the quality wouldn't be the same. Thanks guys for a great quality product. I think it's perfect!
